Uses of Interface
io.netty.channel.socket.aio.AioSocketChannelConfig

  • Packages that use AioSocketChannelConfig 
    Package Description
    io.netty.channel.socket.aio
    NIO2-based socket channel API implementation - recommended for a large number of connections (>= 1000).

    • Uses of AioSocketChannelConfig in io.netty.channel.socket.aio

      AioSocketChannelConfig AioSocketChannelConfig.setReadTimeout(long readTimeoutInMillis)
      Return the read timeout in milliseconds after which a InterruptedByTimeoutException will get thrown.

      AioSocketChannelConfig AioSocketChannelConfig.setWriteTimeout(long writeTimeoutInMillis)
